data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 67,633 believers in Jujuy.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jujuy, Argentina
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Jujuy, Argentina to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, convict the 67,633 believers in Jujuy, Argentina to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Jujuy, Argentina need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help the 67,633 believers find a person of peace today among the 544,267 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Jujuy.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jujuy, Argentina has a population of 611,900.

We estimate Jujuy has 67,633 people who might know Jesus, 502,099 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 42,168 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 6.89 percent of the people of Jujuy are far from Jesus.
